meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: New Reality for Israel With violence continuing and his government crumbling, Prime Minister Ehud Barak reopened Parliament after a recess, urging unity in a time of crisis.
New Reality for Israel With violence continuing and his government crumbling, Prime Minister Ehud Barak reopened Parliament after a recess, urging unity in a time of crisis.
A Windfall for Cuba Venezuela agreed to supply one-third of Cuba's oil needs at cut-rate prices. The arrangement will help cash-starved Cuba but is causing disputes in Caracas.
New Type of Transplant An experimental treatment for Crohn's disease, an intestinal transplant, has been approved by Medicare.
Rocking in Reykjavik Iceland's capital has fewer people than Elizabeth, N.J., but that has not stopped it from being a world power in rock music.
Behind a Broadway Smash It took dedicated believers to bring ''The Full Monty,'' apparently the season's first big Broadway hit, from film to stage.
